title: Launching a Boutique Consultancy: Lessons from Month One
excerpt: The exhilarating reality of building a business from scratch and the unexpected skills I've had to develop beyond my hospitality expertise.
content:
They don't teach you about bookkeeping systems or contract templates in hospitality school. The past month of establishing my consultancy has been an education in aspects of business I never considered while focused on creating beautiful experiences for others.

The learning curve has been steep but exhilarating. Each day brings new challengesâ€”from designing my brand identity to establishing service packages to building a network in a new country. What sustains me through the administrative details is the vision of creating truly distinctive, personalized experiences that honor New Zealand's exceptional landscapes and cultures.
